name: Wood Walkers
description:
A game made for the 100 Dollar Game Jam Week 3.

Drag and drop the logic blocks to the wood walkers to make them move. Controls: Move the logic blocks with the mouse.

Music by ShadyDave.
Song name: Expressions of the mind (Piano loop)
Link: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/325647/
